price: 10. Ils ne respectent, vis-à-vis d’un croyant, ni liens du sang ni engagement. Ceux-là sont les transgresseurs.
arabic: لَا يَرۡقُبُونَ فِي مُؤۡمِنٍ إِلّٗا وَلَا ذِمَّةٗۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lā yarqubūna fī mu'minin illan walā dhimmatan wa-ulāika humu al-muʿ'tadūna
